:mod:`rawls.scene.params`
=========================

.. py:module:: rawls.scene.params

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Generic class which store module params information

   .. attribute:: module

      {str} -- name of the module

   .. attribute:: name

      {str} -- name of the kind module used

   .. attribute:: params_name

      [{str}] -- parameters names of module used

   .. attribute:: params_values

      [{str}] -- parameters values of module used

   .. attribute:: params_types

      [{str}] -- parameters values of module used




---------------


.. py:class:: Params(module, name, params_names, params_values, params_types)

   .. method:: get_params(self)


      Get information about available params

      :returns: [{str}] -- list of available params for this module


   .. method:: get_param(self, name)


      Get specific param value using its name

      :param name: {str} -- expected param name

      :returns: {(str|float|int)} -- returns param value with its specific type


   .. method:: __str__(self)


      Display module information

      :returns: {str} -- module information


   .. method:: to_rawls(self)


      Display module information for .rawls file

      :returns: {str} -- module information for .rawls file
